result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott W. Deraitus was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
If Probation or Extended Supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. 

21 days of jail credit if revoked from Probation

miscConds.notes: PAYABLE DIRECTLY TO AND COLLECTED BY EAU CLAIRE COUNTY CLERK OF COURT.  NOT A CONDITION OF PROBATION.
AODA and follow through with recommendations.

Maintain absolute sobriety. 
Any conditions, programming or treatment per the agent and follow through with recommendations. 
Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge.

Defendant not to consume/possess any alcohol or go into any taverns, bars, liquor stores/place where alcohol is primarily served/sold. 
Defendant not to consume/use/possess any illegal drugs/non-prescribed medications/controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.

timeConds.notes:
Huber and electronic monitoring if jail deems eligible.
All stayed pending further order of the court.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott W. Deraitus

records.addlTxt:
11:00 AM Hearing held via Zoom. Defendant Scott W. Deraitus appeared by video, in custody from the Eau Claire County jail.  Attorney Katherine Cook appeared by video for Scott W. Deraitus.  Attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. State in compliance with victim notification requirements. The parties have an agreement. Defendant waives right to appear in person and court accepts waiver.

Defendant enters a no contest plea to Count 1: Possession of Methamphetamine. Defendant is advised of charges, maximum penalties, elements of the crime(s) and constitutional rights. court accepts plea and finds the defendant guilty. 

Court orders:
2 years Probation sentence withheld with conditions
Conditions of Probation
180 days jail with Huber or electronic monitoring if jail deems him eligible, all stayed pending further order of the court
Maintain absolute sobriety. 
Any conditions, programming or treatment per the agent and follow through with recommendations. 
Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge. 
AODA and follow through with recommendations; to be completed within the 1st 6 months of Probation 
Defendant not to consume/possess any alcohol or go into any taverns, bars, liquor stores/place where alcohol is primarily served/sold. 
Defendant not to consume/use/possess any illegal drugs/non-prescribed medications/controlled substances or drug paraphernalia. 
court costs and surcharges.

Anything else is ordered dismissed and read in. 21 days of jail credit in the event of revocation.
Status conference on September 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.

9:30 AM Attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for State of Wisconsin via Zoom video. Defendant Scott W. Deraitus appeared by video.  Attorney Katherine Cook appeared by video for Scott W. Deraitus. Defendant advised of right to appear in person and waives that right for today's hearing. 

Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas. Defense requests a status conference. 

STC: 09/12/22 at 11am - 30 min via Zoom as Defendant may be living in West Virginia.

Conditions:
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting. 
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety. 
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services.
Letter to defendant with signature bond ordered in court 05/19/2022. Request to return signed bond and Affidavit of Witness form to Clerk of Court no later than 05/31/2022.

Conditions:
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting. 
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety. 
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services.

Judge Jon Theisen for Branch 2 intake. 
(Case called at 9:50 AM) Defendant Scott Deratius appears in person with Attorney Katherine Cook. ADA Tiffany Winter appears in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver. 
Arraignment to be scheduled with Branch 3 Judicial Assistant. 
Defense motions for bond amendment. No objection by State. Court orders signature bond condition be amended.
